oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Identifying Energy Discourses in Canada with Q Methodology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hempel, Christy
Parkins, John
Beckley, Thomas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study includes documents and research material related to the identification of energy discourses in Canada with Q Methodology. Items include the concourse of statements, the sort board, datasets from several studies, and reports.
